name: Twigs
description:
Mr. and Mrs. Beaver must protect their home from ravenous visitors every night! So is the Beaver life. Help them protect their livelihoods by sending them out to fetch wood and build defenses during the day and retreat to their homes at night. How many nights will they live to express their love for one another? That's up to you.

Made in 48 hours as part of Indie Speed Run 2013.

CONTROLS:

Click a Beaver to bring up their action window where you can then issue them commands by clicking on the action buttons. Right click any area to move the selected Beaver to that spot. Build over existing twig blocks to upgrade them!
